channel.title: Hardware on Blog

item.title: UNK rev1 Trackpoint Module
item.description: As a person who have been using Thinkpad computers for years, I was always missing the trackpoint feature. I want to type on mechanical keyboard but also I don’t willing to dismiss the nipple. There are few solution for this issue: UHK, Tex Yoda, Tex Shinobi. These all are expensive keyboard, the shipping cost alone is crazy. Trackpoint module is one of my goals while building UNK and I successfully build it.

item.title: My First Custom Handwired Keyboard Build: UNK
item.description: More detail and build logs : https://github.com/herpiko/unk
